data.name: Sex Diary - Futanari Massage
data.detailed_description:
An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of a gorgeous young woman discovering the art of erotic massage for the first time, when she accepts a gift card from her maid to a Futanari Only Massage parlor.

DESCRIPTION
Mei Mei is struggling in a toxic relationship.
Her boyfriend is a controlling bastard who keeps her hidden from the outside world.
She isn’t allowed to have friends; she isn’t allowed to speak with anyone; she isn’t allowed to be touched by anyone else except him…
She is kept at home in a rigid bubble like a fancy doll in a casket of glass, while he goes out and enjoys everything life has to offer.
It isn’t fair for so many reasons!
She is a young woman full of life who deserves better.
So when her only friend and confidant – her maid – gives her a gift card to her favorite massage parlor, she jumps at the opportunity of pampering herself and doesn't ask many questions.
Little does she know what an innocent massage appointment will mean to her…when the massage parlor turns out to be operated by futanari ladies with absolutely no limits.
Will she back down from the challenge or face it head on?
There is only one way to find out…

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

content_descriptors.notes:
Sexual intercourse between a woman and a futanari (transgender) character. 
Naked characters.
